outcome.title: Limits of special transcendental functions
outcome.description: I can compute limits of special transcendental functions.

outcome.title: Limits with L'Hôpital's Rule
outcome.description: I can compute limits using L'Hôpital's Rule when the initial form is indeterminate of type 0/0 or ∞/∞.

outcome.title: The definition of derivative
outcome.description: I can use the definition of the derivative as a limit and knowledge of special transcendental functions to compute derivatives of sin(x) and cos(x).

outcome.title: Derivatives of trigonometric functions
outcome.description: I can use the quotient rule and knowledge of sin(x) and cos(x) to compute derivatives of sec(x), csc(x), tan(x), and cot(x).

outcome.title: Identify and apply derivative rules
outcome.description: I can identify which differentiation rule(s) need to be applied (in order); moreover, I can apply the rules to compute the derivative.

outcome.title: Related rates
outcome.description: I can solve related rates problems.

outcome.title: First derivatives and sign charts
outcome.description: I can make a *sign chart* for the first derivative and use it to (1) find where a function is increasing/decreasing, and (2) classify *critical points*. In other words, I can perform a **first derivative test**.

outcome.title: Second derivatives and sign charts
outcome.description: I can make a *sign chart* for the second derivative and use it to (1) find where a function is concave up/down, and (2) locate points of inflection.

outcome.title: Optimization
outcome.description: I can solve optimization problems using knowledge of differentiation.

outcome.title: Basic indefinite integrals: power rule and special functions
outcome.description: I can compute antiderivatives (aka general indefinite integrals) for linear combinations of power functions and functions which I recognize as a derivative of a special function.

outcome.title: Indefinite integrals via substitution
outcome.description: I can compute indefinite integrals with the substitution method.

outcome.title: Integration and motion
outcome.description: I can solve physics problems involving motion of objects along a straight line.

outcome.title: Definite integrals and the Fundamental Theorem of Calculus
outcome.description: I can compute definite integrals using the Fundamental Theorem of Calculus.
